WMRGL Bioinformatics Documentation

This application provides links to external documentation used by the Bioinformatics team and is divided into the following sections:

General

General bioinformatics documentation (e.g. general data storage).

Next Generation Sequencing (NGS)

Documentation relating to NGS data analysis.

Training

Competency records for current bioinformatics employees.
